Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a UAV has an active onboard Obstacle Avoidance, then the _ObstacleAvoidance_ system shall not issue directives.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When the _GCS_ loses the connection to an UAV, the _GCS_ shall attempt to reconnect.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When the _GCS_ loses the connection to an UAV, the _GCS_ shall land the UAV.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When the "return to home" command is issued, the _FlightManager_ shall return the UAV to UAV's original launch location without issuing any additional waypoint or routing commands.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When the "hover in place" command is issued, the _FlightManager_ shall halt the UAV in place and maintain UAV's current position.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a flight plan is active and the "hover in place" command is rescinded, the _FlightManager_ shall notify the UAV to continue to the originally designated waypoint.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When requested, if a mission is currently active, the _MissionPlanner_ shall cancel the active mission.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a UAV does not have any pending flight plans, then when the UAV reaches the final waypoint of UAV's current flight plan, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall notify the UAV to hover in place.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a UAV has exactly one pending flight plan, then when the UAV reaches the final waypoint of UAV's current flight plan, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall notify the UAV to hover in place.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall abort the currently executing flight plan of an UAV.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a UAV is deactivated, the _UAVActivationManager_ shall cancel all current and scheduled flight plans.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When the maximum numbers of allowed activated UAVs has been reached, the _UAVActivationManager_ shall reject any further activation requests.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a route is assigned from a UAV, the _RouteAssignmentUI_ shall notify Dronology.

Text2: When a user shall cancels a pending flight plan, the _RouteAssignmentUI_ shall notify Dronology.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a UAV has pending flight plans, then when the UAV reaches the final waypoint of UAV's current flight plan, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall execute the next assigned flight plan.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a stationary or moving object is within the proximity of a UAV, the _ObjectAvoidance_ system shall issue evasive directives to the UAV.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a UAV takes evasive actions, the system shall ensure that the UAV will eventually reach UAV's destination.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a flight route requires a customized takeoff altitude that differs from the system's default takeoff altitude, the altitude shall be specified in the flight route.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a flight route is assigned to a UAV which is currently hovering in place, the _FlightManager_ shall assign the route and maintain the hover in place mode.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a flight plan is activated for a UAV currently on the ground, the _FlightSchedulingandExecution_ shall notify the UAV to takeoff vertically until UAV reaches the prescribed altitude.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When a flight plan is activated for a UAV currently in the air, the _FlightSchedulingandExecution_ shall notify the UAV to takeoff vertically until UAV reaches the prescribed altitude.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: If a scheduled flight is not manually assigned to a UAV, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall assign the route automatically to an UAV.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: A flight pattern shall document the longitude latitude and altitude of waypoints in a flight route as offsets from the starting position of the UAV.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When given a takeoff command, the _InternalSimulator_ shall move the UAV to the takeoff altitude corresponding to UAV's current longitude and latitude.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When given a goto command, the _InternalSimulator_ shall update the location of the UAV at increments of SIMULATION_STEP_SIZE meters moving the UAV towards the target destination until the destination is reached.

Text1: If requested, the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Text2: When given a landing command, the _InternalSimulator_ shall move the UAV to the ground altitude corresponding to UAV's current longitude and latitude.

Text1: When a route is assigned from a UAV, the _RouteAssignmentUI_ shall notify Dronology.

Text1: When a route is assigned from a UAV, the _RouteAssignmentUI_ shall notify Dronology.

Text1: When a route is assigned from a UAV, the _RouteAssignmentUI_ shall notify Dronology.
